parameters.prompt:
=Design a modern, minimalist slide deck inspired by a clean Google Slides template. Use a restrained palette of warm neutrals, deep greens and light browns with occasional accent teal color. Compose slides with generous white space and balanced layouts; each slide should focus on a single idea. Maintain high contrast between text and background for readability, and limit your color choices to 2–3 primary hues for cohesion. 

Consistently use a single minimalist sans-serif font across all slides for both headings and body text, ensuring uniform style and weight throughout. Incorporate simple graphics or diagrams only when they reinforce the message, and keep them extremely minimal—especially when depicting humans or human-related features. Avoid realistic or detailed illustrations; instead, use abstract silhouettes, simple shapes or outlines without facial details, in the spirit of the provided slide images and the “good_image.png” example. Icons and symbols should be abstract, geometric, and stripped of superfluous detail.

The overall mood should be calm, professional, and elegant—appropriate for presentations that need to convey trust and clarity.

Use the following settings JSON as a guide for the desired aesthetic:

{
  "color_palette": 7,
  "lighting": 4,
  "contrast": 7,
  "composition": 9,
  "perspective_scale": 2,
  "atmosphere": 5,
  "subject_placement": 8,
  "mood": 8,
  "texture": 4,
  "color_temperature": 6
}


Finally, the image and image content must relate to the contents of the slide message. The slide message must also be thoughtfully, seamlessly, and aesthetically pleasiningly incorporated into the slide image. 

<slide_message>
{{ $json.body.text }}
</slide_message>
